# Lifesteal Utils

**Utilities, QoL and timers for the Lifesteal Network**  
_Not maintained by the Lifesteal Network!_

![Modrinth Downloads](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/dt/lifestealutils?logo=modrinth&logoColor=%231bd96b&label=Downloads&labelColor=black&color=%231bd96b)   ![Mod Loader](https://img.shields.io/badge/Mod_Loader-Fabric-beige?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,&label=Mod%20Loader&labelColor=black)
</div>

---

## Highlighted features

<details>
<summary><strong>View highlighted features</strong></summary>

### Alliances
**Add people as allies, have their nametags be highlighted in a different color!**

### Timers
**Track custom enchant timers on a customizable HUD**

![A picture of the HUD editing interface, in which HUD elements can be moved around](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/5eb2d7a9a8fc101b6f80c997ed1e66ae67a7d00f.png)

### Customize Everything
**Tailor the chat. Remove aspects you're not interested in.**

![A screenshot showcasing the customizability of team chat format](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/8ef25cd53eb709e36a8ab8d50fd316c9957e2491.png)

![A message showcasing the customizability of DM messages](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/0b275026bef05e81435228cc434432a9c1df595e.png)

![An image showcasing further simplification options for the chat](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/419c4a7865b2ef94dd8a9d5c5c2dd3e52582218f.png)

![Replace this with a description](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/a9d61524ca1ddfc01d0f9ebb878132f95521f559.png)

### Hub Auto-Join
**Automatically transport from the hub to the server on join.**

### Rare Item Highlights
**Highlight rare items on the ground.**

</details>

## Maintainer

Hi! I, **Candycup**, am the core maintainer of LSU. If you think you remember me from somewhere, I was long-time staff, current Discord systems dev, and previously one of the managers of Lifesteal Network.

Regardless of my involvement with the server, this mod is **not officially endorsed, supported, or maintained** by the Lifesteal Network team. Itâ€™s an independent effort to provide a cleaner gameplay experience so more people can enjoy the server to the extent that they want to.
